reporting-org.narrative: The Global Fund to Fight AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria

title.narrative: Towards ending AIDS as a public health threat by 2030

description.narrative: Zimbabwe - HIV - United Nations Development Programme - UNDP Zimbabwe. This program has the following goals: Contribute to achieving improved wellbeing and healthy lives for all population groups through universal access to HIV prevention, treatment, care and support services. The objectives of this program are: Reduced HIV incidence among adults and adolescents by 90% by 2020. Reduced new HIV infections among children by 90% by 2020. Reduced HIV related maternal deaths by 75% by 2020. Reduced under-five HIV-related child mortality by 90% by 2020. Reduced HIV-related mortality by 90% for both adults and children by 2020

title.narrative: ZWE-H-UNDP Program Agreement 4
ZWE-H-UNDP Program Agreement
ZWE-H-UNDP Implementation Letter 1
ZWE-H-UNDP Implementation Letter 1
ZWE-H-UNDP Implementation Letter 3
Coverage / Output indicator for ZWE-H-UNDP
Percentage of infants born to HIV-positive women receiving a virological test for HIV within 2 months of birth
Percentage of adults (15 and above) on ART among all adults living with HIV at the end of the reporting period
Percentage of people newly diagnosed with HIV initiated on ART
Percentage of sex workers reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
Percentage of HIV-positive results among the total HIV tests performed during the reporting period
Percentage of adolescent girls and young women reached with HIV prevention programs- defined package of services
Percentage of HMIS or other routine reporting units submitting timely reports according to national guidelines
Percentage of young people aged 10-24 years attending school reached by compehensive sexuality education and/or life skills-based HIV education in schools
Number of women and men aged 15+ who received an HIV test and know their results
Number of medical male circumcisions performed according to national standards
Percentage of sex workers that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
Number and % of people on ART with Viral Load test done within 12 months
Percentage of sex workers using PrEP in priority sex workers PrEP populations
Percentage of eligible men who have sex with men who initiated oral antiretroviral PrEP during the reporting period
Percentage of men who have sex with men that have received an HIV test during the reporting period and know their results
Percentage of HIV-exposed infants receiving a virological test for HIV within 2 months of birth
Percentage of eligible sex workers who initiated oral antiretroviral PrEP during the reporting period
Percentage of men who have sex with men reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
Percentage of people living with HIV currently receiving antiretroviral therapy
YP-Other 3: Number of pupils aged 10 -24 years receiving educational assistance in school
YP-Other 1: Percentage of vulnerable girls referred by Sister to Sister mentors for HIV testing.
Percentage of people living with HIV initiated on ART who are screened for TB in HIV treatment settings
Vacancy rate: Number of full time posts unfilled for at least 6 months as a percentage of total number of funded posts
TCS-other 2: Number and percentage of eligible children currently receiving antiretroviral therapy
Percentage of adolescent girls and young women (AGYW) reached with HIV prevention programs- defined package of services
Percentage of HIV-positive women who received ART during pregnancy and/or labour and delivery
Percentage of children (under 15) on ART among all children living with HIV at the end of the reporting period
Number of adolescent girls and young women who were tested for HIV and received their results during the reporting period
YP-Other 2: Percentage of vulnerable girls reached with comprehensive HIV prevention packages - defined package of services by sister to sister mentors
Number of people who were tested for HIV and received their results during the reporting period
% of people on ART with VL suppression(<1000c/ml) at 12 months after ART initiation
Percentage of ART sites that had a stock-out of any antiretroviral drugs during the reporting period
Percentage of HIV-positive registered TB patients given anti-retroviral therapy during TB treatment
PMTCT-other 1: Number and percentage of infants born to HIV positive mothers who received ARV prophylaxis (PMTCT)
Percentage of HIV-positive pregnant women who received antiretrovirals to reduce the risk of mother-to-child transmission
HW-Other 1: Annual rate of retention of nurses at primary health care facilities.
Impact indicator for ZWE-H-UNDP
Number of new HIV infections per 1000 uninfected population
Estimated percentage of children newly infected with HIV from mother-to-child transmission among women living with HIV delivering in the past 12 months
Percentage of adults and children with HIV known to be on treatment 12 months after initiation of antiretroviral therapy
AIDS-related mortality (Adults)
Percentage of infants born to HIV-infected mothers who are infected
Number of AIDS-related deaths per 100,000 population
HIV I -Other 1: Percentage of HIV infected among HIV-exposed infants born in the past 12 months
AIDS-related mortality (Children less than 5 years)
Percentage of young women and men aged 15–24 years who are HIV infected
Outcome indicator for ZWE-H-UNDP
Percentage of people living with HIV and on ART who are virologically suppressed
Percentage of females aged 15-24 who dropped out of school in the last year

Percentage of people living with HIV not on ART at the end of the reporting period among people living with HIV who were either on ART at the end of the last reporting period or newly initiated on ART during the reporting period
Proportion of ever-married or partnered women aged 15-49 who experienced physical or sexual violence from a male intimate partner in the past 12 months
Percent of respondents who say they used a condom the last time they had sex with a non-marital, non-cohabiting partner, of those who have had sex with such a partner in the last 12 months
Percentage of people living with HIV who know their HIV status at the end of the reporting period
HIV O-Other 2: Percentage of Women aged 15-49 years who believe a husband is justified in beating his wife in various circumstances
Percentage of adults and children with HIV, known to be on treatment 12 months after initiation of antiretroviral therapy
HIV O-Other 1: Percentage of men aged 15-49 reporting use of confoms at last paid sex session
Percentage of women and men aged 15-49 who have had sexual intercourse with more than one partner in the past 12 months
% of women and men aged 15-49 years who have had more than one sexual partner in the past 12 months who used a condom during their last sexual intercourse
